People_and_Groups.description: Entities representing individual people or groups based on nationality, religion, or political affiliation.

NORP.description: Nationalities or religious or political groups

Places.description: Geographical entities, both geopolitical and physical locations.

LOC.description: Non-GPE locations, mountain ranges, bodies of water

Organizations.description: Named groups of people formed for a particular purpose, such as companies or institutions.

Objects_and_Artifacts.description: Physical items, creative works, or official documents.

Events.description: Named occurrences, such as historical events, natural disasters, or sports competitions.

EVENT.description: Named hurricanes, battles, wars, sports events, etc.

Languages.description: Named human languages, spoken or written.

Temporal.description: Time-related entities, including dates and times of day.

DATE.description: Absolute or relative dates or periods

QUANTITY.description: Measurements, as of weight or distance

CARDINAL.description: Numerals that do not fall under another type
